Land Mine has a dream, one of the past, before she ever camr to Earth.

Lan=
d Mine is on Cybertron, for some reason, she was being forced into this arm=
y or she would die. Their leader was Deemos, Inzola was near him. Time Bomb=
 was at her side, and at her other side was her friend, Tint. Tint was call=
ed up with another bot, Psuedo, and the 2 were beat up until they were blee=
ding. Time Bomb and Land Mine were called up later, and were beat on as wel=
l. Later, a really old bot named Lightmare granted the location of an enemy=
 base, and was granted some youth, so she could warn them of enemy location=
s in the future perhaps. The location was wrong, but Lightmare didn't get a=
way with it.

"That was because we lost the last battle." Deemos said.

"Th=
e next battle is on the other side of the planet, let's move!" Inzola said.=
 The dream flashed to another scene. Psuedo came up with the idea of escapi=
ng, but Land Mine and Time Bomb didn't like it. They found that Deemos was =
killing all of his troops  to replace them with drones, and they had to run=
. They fled to Cybertron on a ship, but Psuedo had to escape in a stasis po=
d to get away fast enough. Land Mine never knew if Tint got out all right a=
nd in one piece, or even alive. Deemos' drones were all easily destroyed, a=
s they weren't as powerful as his old army, and he and Inzola fled to Earth=
, which happened to be the planet Psuedo, Land Mine, and Time Bomb ended up=
 on. And now, Inzola isn't with him, Lightmare is dead, and Deemos is rebui=
lding his army. Land Mine's dream turned into a nightmare, where Deemos rul=
ed the universe. Deemos killed everyone except for Land Mine, then killed h=
is own partners before Land Mine's eyes. Deemos finally swung a sword and s=
liced Land Mine spart. Land Mine's dream changed into a world of nothiness =
then, a world where she was now. Except she didn't know it was only the CR =
Tank. The world spun, and never stopped flashing...
